name: mm::page_table::node::entry::Entry::<'a, 'rcu, C>::replace

mm::page_table::node::child::Child::<C>:.doc:
# Safety

 The provided PTE must be the output of [`Self::into_pte`], and the PTE:
  - must not be used to created a [`Child`] twice;
  - must not be referenced by a living [`ChildRef`].

 The level must match the original level of the child.
Returns whether the child is not present.

mm::page_table::node::PageTableGuard::<'.doc: Gets the mutable reference to the number of valid PTEs in the node.

Writes a page table entry at a given index.

 This operation will leak the old child if the old PTE is present.

 # Safety

 The caller must ensure that:
  1. The index must be within the bound;
  2. The PTE must represent a [`Child`] in the same [`PageTableConfig`]
     and at the right paging level (`self.level() - 1`).
  3. The page table node will have the ownership of the [`Child`]
     after this method.

mm::page_table::node::child::Child: Unknown([Deref, Downcast(VariantIdx(1, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(1, Ty { id: 1, kind: RigidTy(Uint(U8)) })])

Unknown([Deref, Downcast(VariantIdx(0, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 5508, kind: RigidTy(Adt(AdtDef(DefId { id: 5361, name: "sync::rcu::RcuDrop" }), GenericArgs([Type(Ty { id: 5483, kind: RigidTy(Adt(AdtDef(DefId { id: 3414, name: "mm::frame::Frame" }), GenericArgs([Type(Ty { id: 5484, kind: RigidTy(Adt(AdtDef(DefId { id: 5364, name: "mm::page_table::node::PageTablePageMeta" }), GenericArgs([Type(Ty { id: 5469, kind: Param(ParamTy { index: 2, name: "C" }) })]))) })]))) })]))) })])

doc:
Replaces the entry with a new child.

 The old child is returned.

 # Panics

 The method panics if the level of the new child does not match the
 current node.
